chinese: Hi! 我到图书馆去了一下.
english: Hi! I dropped by the library.

chinese: 他们那儿有不少新CD,
english: They have a bunch of new CDs

chinese: 你没事吧?
english: Are you OK?

chinese: 你的女儿存心要跟我过不去.
english: Your daughter has it in for me.

chinese: Oh,现在她成了我的女儿了,
english: Oh, now she's my daughter.

chinese: 这可不是个好兆头. 你们吵架了?
english: That's not a good sign. Did you have a fight?

chinese: -Oh yes.  -关于什么呢?
english: -Oh yes.  -What about?

chinese: 横跨全国的旅行
english: The cross-country trip.

chinese: 她还在纠缠这件事吗?
english: Is she still going on about that?

chinese: 我还以为她巳经不抱希望了呢.
english: I thought she would have given up on it by now.

chinese: 她对付我的办法就是不停地问为什么.
english: Her tactic is to keep asking why.

chinese: 我把道理全都告诉她了,可就是说服不了她.
english: I tell her all the reasons and I cannot talk her out of it.

chinese: 她问为什么的时候, 你就应该学我的样子来回答.
english: When she asks why, you should say what I say.

chinese: 怎么回答?
english: Which is?

chinese: "因为这是我说的."
english: "Because I said so."

chinese: 这话几年以前也许还有用,
english: That might have worked a few years ago.

chinese: 现在不会奏效了.
english: It won't work now.

chinese: 也许吧. 你想要我跟她谈谈吗?
english: Maybe. Do you want me to talk to her?

chinese: 不. 这个问题我必须自己来面对.
english: No. I need to face up to this one myself.

chinese: 你不用担心,亲爱的.
english: Don't worry, honey.

chinese: 虽然她有时候意识不到,
english: She doesn't know it sometimes,

chinese: 但其实她是很爱你和崇拜你的.
english: but she does love you and look up to you.

chinese: 我还以为青春期的女孩一般只对妈妈发脾气呢.
english: I thought adolescent girls were supposed to act up with their mothers.

chinese: 你说什么? 你难道忘了她十二三岁的时候了?
english: Excuse me? Have we forgotten ages 12 and 13?

chinese: 整整两年啊,她老对着我哭啊, 摔门
english: two solid years of tears and door-slamming?

chinese: 还有呢,我还记得,(那时候)你做什么都是对的.
english: And, as I recall, you could do no wrong.

chinese: No, no, 我已经尽过职了. 祝你好运. Salsa!
english: No, no, I have paid my dues, Good luck. Salsa!
